uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.cache.impl

Class JcsCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.cache.impl.JcsCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The object type that acts as the key for the cache
    V - The value that is stored in the cache
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICache<K,V>

    public class JcsCache<K,V>
extends Object
implements ICache<K,V>
    Implementation of the ICache interface, using a JCS GroupCacheAccess object as the cache data store.
